findings.rationale: The indefinite duration of confidentiality obligations may pose a long-term risk, as it could restrict future business opportunities indefinitely.
findings.evidence_quote: The obligations under this Agreement shall continue in perpetuity and shall survive any termination of discussions between the parties.

findings.rationale: The clause requiring unlimited indemnification exposes parties to potentially significant financial liabilities without a cap.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party shall indemnify and hold harmless the other party from and against all claims, losses, damages, and expenses, without limit.

findings.rationale: The absence of a limitation on liability can lead to severe financial consequences in case of breaches or disputes.
findings.evidence_quote: Notwithstanding any other provision, neither party's liability shall be limited under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: Exclusive ownership of work products by Company A may lead to disputes or dissatisfaction from the other party regarding contributions.
findings.evidence_quote: All work product and deliverables created hereunder shall be owned exclusively by Company A.

findings.rationale: The clause allowing recovery of attorneys' fees may discourage parties from pursuing legitimate claims due to the risk of incurring high legal costs.
findings.evidence_quote: The prevailing party in any dispute shall be entitled to recover all attorneys' fees and costs from the non-prevailing party.
